embed.description:
Gear up and go on adventures with friends. Level up your profile and get some sick loot!
[] = optional args, <> = required args

fields.name: .register <profile_name>
fields.value: Register a new profile with a name.

fields.name: .profile [@user]
fields.value: View your own or another user's profile

fields.name: .item <slot>
fields.value: View more information on an item in your inventory.
